```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(vegan)

```


```{r}
data <- read_csv(here("data/normalized_pressures_chr_data.csv")) 

data <- data %>% 
  select(fips,
         per_rural,
         mean_pressure_disturbance_norm,
         mean_pressure_ghg_norm,
         mean_pressure_nutrient_norm,
         mean_pressure_water_norm,
         cumulative_pressure,
         population,
         air_pollution_avg_daily_pm2.5,
         per_child_poverty,
         median_household_income,
         residential_segregation_black_white,
         per_black,
         per_asian,
         per_nativeHA_other_pacific_isl,
         per_hispanic,
         life_expectancy,
         per_adults_diabetes,
         per_uninsured_adults,
         per_adult_obesity)

data <- data %>% 
  na.rm()

```

```{r}
my_rda <- rda(cumulative_pressure_df ~ per_rural + population + median_household_income + per_black + per_asian + per_hispanic, data)
```

```{r}
cumulative_pressure_df <- data %>% 
  select(fips, cumulative_pressure)
```
